newsitem.title: FRANCE: Alcatel wins 1-bln-Ffr SNCF/Cegetel telecoms deal.
newsitem.headline: Alcatel wins 1-bln-Ffr SNCF/Cegetel telecoms deal.

text.p: Cegetel, the telecommunications unit of Generale des Eaux, and railroad operator SNCF have selected the Alcatel Alsthom group to supply their long-distance network, Alcatel Alsthom said on Wednesday.
The contract was made through Telecom Developpement, the common subsidiary of Cegetel and SNCF, it said in a statement.

The total value of the contract exceeds one billion francs. Alcatel Alsthom will supply switching and transmissions systems, including ten transit switches, intelligent network platforms and services. It will take care of network management and maintenance until 2002, the company said.
